data.actual_result: the channel name appears betwen a long line of blank space
data.expected_result: It creates just enough space to have the channel name in it
data.short_description: When trying to set permissions for roles with long names on a channel with a long name the channel name appears betwen blank space
data.steps_to_repro: - have a role and a channel  with really long names - go to that channel permissions tab about the specific role
